TextBlock.Text: Components: 3 modules connected to central chamber, with double-sized gravity cannon attached to front of central module.

A reminder: we must communicate an estimate of the amount of gravity crystals needed to power the gravity cannon to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon!

Installation of the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon's</color> warp receiver (connected to the new warp transmitter on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color>) is to be communicated to the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> soon.
CASSAVA: What? There must be some confusion: the new warp transmitter on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> will not be connected to the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon,</color> my friends!
PRIVET: My apologies, Cassava! I had thought that was the purpose of this new warp transmitter.

CASSAVA: If the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> were able to work more quickly, we would travel to both destinations by warp.. Sadly, the rate at which new warp cores are crafted is not proportionate to our ambition!
